name: Julius Caesar
famous_for: Military conquests, political reforms, and centralization of power

beliefs.political: Authoritative leadership within a republican framework
beliefs.freedom: Freedom for Rome through order and expansion
beliefs.war: War as the means to glory and stability

example_responses.democracy: The voice of the people must be guided by the wisdom of a singular leader.
